title: Take a stand against 3 mine expansion
description: The Albanese Government just approved three massive coal mine expansions, locking in billions of tonnes of climate pollution that will worsen floods, bushfires, and heat waves. Join the fight to protect our climate, water, and communities—sign the petition demanding an end to new and expanded coal mines.
